      • LoadAllAtLocation

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Segment> LoadAllAtLocation(Location start,
                                             int startTime)
        This function returns an ArrayList of Segments of all the Segments that start at the given Location and leave after the given start time
        Parameters:
        start - This is the starting location of the Segments to load
        startTime - This is the earliest estimated time that the vehicle on this Segment can leave
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of the Segments that start at the given location and leave after the given time
